description: This table contains temporary transaction documentation provider information.

columns.name: HTT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CHG_DOC_PROV_ID
columns.description: The documentation provider associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: CHG_DOC_FUNCTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The documentation function associated with the transaction line.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Supervised


Performed


Assisted


Observed


Billing Provider


Surrogate Provider


Ordering Provider

columns.name: CHG_DOC_HTT_LINE_LIST
columns.description: The documentation procedure list associated with the transaction line.
